041        
042        /**
043         * This annotation allows to customize keys for features.
044         * The value shall be a YAML map of feature names to keys. If entry value is a string it is treated as a key name.
045         */
046        public static final String FEATURE_KEYS = "feature-keys";
047        
048        /**
049         * Feature key Nasdanika {@link EAnnotation} to specify a key used to load a feature and to use in URI path construction.
050         */
051        public static final String FEATURE_KEY = "feature-key";
052        
053        public static final String NASDANIKA_ANNOTATION_SOURCE = "urn:org.nasdanika";
054        
055        private NcoreUtil() {
056                throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Utility class");
057        }
058
059        public static EAnnotation getNasdanikaAnnotation(EModelElement modelElement) {
060                return modelElement == null ? null : modelElement.getEAnnotation(NASDANIKA_ANNOTATION_SOURCE);
061        }
062
063        public static String getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(EModelElement modelElement, String key) {
064                return getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(modelElement, key, null);
065        }
066
067        public static String getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(EModelElement modelElement, String key, String defaultValue) {
068                EAnnotation na = getNasdanikaAnnotation(modelElement);
069                if (na == null || !na.getDetails().containsKey(key)) {
070                        return defaultValue;
071                }
072                return na.getDetails().get(key);
073        }
074
075        /**
076         * Flattened inheritance hierarchy from the argument class to all of its supertypes in the order of inheritance.
077         * @param eClass
078         * @return
079         */
080        public static List<EClass> lineage(EClass eClass) {
081                List<EClass> ret = new ArrayList<>();
082                ret.add(eClass);
083                for (EClass sc: eClass.getESuperTypes()) {
084                        for (EClass scLineage: lineage(sc)) {
085                                if (!ret.contains(scLineage)) {
086                                        ret.add(scLineage);
087                                }
088                        }
089                }
090                return ret;
091        }
092
093        /**
094         * Finds objects referencing the argument object (target) via the specified reference.
095         * @param <T>
096         * @param target Referenced object
097         * @param eReference Reference
098         * @return Object referencing this one via the specified reference.
099         */
100        public static <T extends EObject> EList<T> getReferrers(EObject target, EReference eReference) {
101                EList<T> ret = new BasicInternalEList<>(EObject.class);
102                
103                Resource res = target.eResource(); 
104                TreeIterator<?> cit = null;
105                if (res == null) {
106                        EObject root = target;
107                        EObject rc;
108                        while ((rc = root.eContainer()) != null) {
109                                root = rc;
110                        }
111                        if (root != null) {
112                                NcoreUtil.collect(root, target, eReference, ret);
113                                cit = root.eAllContents();
114                        }                       
115                } else {
116                        ResourceSet rSet = res.getResourceSet();
117                        cit = rSet == null ? res.getAllContents() : rSet. getAllContents();
118                }
119                if (cit != null) {
120                        while (cit.hasNext()) {
121                                NcoreUtil.collect(cit.next(), target, eReference, ret);
122                        }                       
123                }
124                return ret;
125        }
126
127        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
128        private static <T extends EObject> void collect(
129                        Object source, 
130                        EObject target, 
131                        EReference eReference,
132                        EList<T> accumulator) {
133                if (eReference.getEContainingClass().isInstance(source)) {
134                        Object value = ((EObject) source).eGet(eReference);
135                        if (eReference.isMany()) {
136                                if (((Collection<?>) value).contains(target)) {
137                                        accumulator.add((T) source);
138                                }
139                        } else if (value == target) {
140                                accumulator.add((T) source);
141                        }                                       
142                }
143        }
144
145        /**
146         * Creates a proxy of given type with given URI 
147         * @param eClass
148         * @param uri
149         * @return
150         */
151        public static EObject createProxy(EClass type, URI uri) {
152                EObject proxy = type.getEPackage().getEFactoryInstance().create(type);
153                ((InternalEObject) proxy).eSetProxyURI(uri);
154                if (proxy instanceof NamedElement) {
155                        ((NamedElement) proxy).setName(type.getName() + " proxy for " + uri);
156                }
157                return proxy;
158        }
159
160        /**
161         * Containment path relative to the object container. If the container is a map entry its key is added to path and the entry container is skipped. This happens recursively. 
162         * @param eObject
163         * @return null if there is no container. BiSupplier with first returning the first container which is not EMap entry and reference name concatenated with object key for {@link EMap}'s and with object index for many-references.
164         * Containment index is constructed taking eKeys into account.
165         */
166        public static BiSupplier<EObject, String> containmentPath(EObject eObj) {
167                EObject container = eObj.eContainer();
168                if (container == null) {
169                        return null;
170                }
171                EReference eContainmentFeature = eObj.eContainmentFeature();
172                
173                LinkedList<String> containmentIndex = new LinkedList<>();
174                while (NcoreUtil.isEMapEntry(container)) {
175                        Object key = ((Map.Entry<?,?>) container).getKey();
176                        if (key == null) {
177                                return null;
178                        }
179                        String idx = NcoreUtil.containmentIndex(eObj);
180                        if (idx != null) {
181                                containmentIndex.addFirst(idx);
182                        }
183                        containmentIndex.addFirst(key.toString());
184                        
185                        eContainmentFeature = container.eContainmentFeature();
186                        container = container.eContainer();
187                }
188                
189                if (containmentIndex.isEmpty()) {
190                        String idx = NcoreUtil.containmentIndex(eObj);
191                        if (idx != null) {
192                                containmentIndex.add(idx);
193                        }
194                } 
195        
196                containmentIndex.addFirst(NcoreUtil.getFeatureKey(container.eClass(), eContainmentFeature));
197                return BiSupplier.of(container, String.join("/", containmentIndex));                            
198        }
199
200        /**
201         * Index part of the containment path. Null for single references. EKeys for containments with EKeys. Position otherwise.
202         * @param eObj
203         * @return
204         */
205        private static String containmentIndex(EObject eObj) {
206                EObject container = eObj.eContainer();
207                if (container == null) {
208                        return null;
209                }
210                EReference eContainmentFeature = eObj.eContainmentFeature();
211                if (eContainmentFeature.isMany()) {
212                        EList<EAttribute> eKeys = eContainmentFeature.getEKeys();
213                        String position = String.valueOf(((List<?>) container.eGet(eContainmentFeature)).indexOf(eObj));
214                        if (eKeys.isEmpty()) {
215                                return position;
216                        }
217                        StringBuilder pathBuilder = new StringBuilder();
218                        for (EAttribute eKey: eKeys) {
219                                Object value = eObj.eGet(eKey);
220                                if (value == null || (value instanceof String && Util.isBlank((String) value))) {
221                                        return pathBuilder.length() == 0 ? position : pathBuilder.toString();
222                                }
223                                if (pathBuilder.length() > 0) {
224                                        pathBuilder.append("/");
225                                }
226                                pathBuilder.append(value);
227                        }
228                        return pathBuilder.toString();
229                }
230                return null;
231        }
232
233                /**
234                 * Uses {@link ModelElement}.getUris() if the argument is an instance of ModelElement to compute URI's.
235                 * Computes {@link URI}'s from the containment reference otherwise.
236                 * @param eObj
237                 * @return
238                 */
239                public static List<URI> getIdentifiers(EObject eObj) {
240                        if (eObj == null || isEMapEntry(eObj)) {
241                                return Collections.emptyList(); // EMap entries do not have URI's.
242                        }
243                        
244                        int ignoredOwnIdentifiers = 0; // Sets to 1 for UUID so containment URI's are resolved despite its presence.
245
246                        List<URI> ownIdentifiers = new ArrayList<>();
247                        if (eObj instanceof ModelElement) {
248                                for (String uri: ((ModelElement) eObj).getUris()) {
249                                        if (!Util.isBlank(uri)) {
250                                                ownIdentifiers.add(URI.createURI(uri));
251                                        }
252                                }
253                                
254                                String uuid = ((ModelElement) eObj).getUuid();
255                                if (!Util.isBlank(uuid)) {
256                                        ownIdentifiers.add(URI.createGenericURI("uuid", uuid, null));
257                                        ++ignoredOwnIdentifiers;
258                                }
259                        }                       
260                        
261                        if (eObj instanceof SemanticIdentity) {
262                                ownIdentifiers.addAll(((SemanticIdentity) eObj).getIdentifiers());
263                        }
264                        
265                        BiSupplier<EObject, String> containmentPath = containmentPath(eObj);
266                        if (containmentPath == null) {
267                                return ownIdentifiers;
268                        }
269                        
270                        EObject container = containmentPath.getFirst();
271                        
272                        // Computing all permutations
273                        Collection<URI> ret = new HashSet<>();
274                        
275                        List<URI> relativeOwnIdentifiers = new ArrayList<>();
276                        for (URI ownURI: ownIdentifiers) {
277                                if (ownURI.isRelative()) {
278                                        relativeOwnIdentifiers.add(ownURI);
279                                } else {
280                                        ret.add(ownURI); // Absolute or opaque
281                                }
282                        }
283                        
284                        // Resolving containment URI's
285                        for (URI cURI: getIdentifiers(container)) {
286                                if (!cURI.isRelative() && cURI.isHierarchical()) {
287                                        String cLastSegment = cURI.lastSegment();
288                                        if (cLastSegment == null || cLastSegment.length() > 0) {
289                                                cURI = cURI.appendSegment("");
290                                        }
291                                        for (URI relativeOwnURI: relativeOwnIdentifiers) {
292                                                URI resolved = resolve(relativeOwnURI,cURI);
293                                                if (resolved != null) {
294                                                        ret.add(resolved);
295                                                }                                               
296                                        }
297                                }
298
299                                if (ownIdentifiers.size() == ignoredOwnIdentifiers) { // Resorting to containment URI's only if there are no own URI's which are not UUID.
300                                        URI containmentURI = URI.createURI(containmentPath.getSecond());                                
301                                        URI resolved = resolve(containmentURI,cURI);
302                                        if (resolved != null) {
303                                                ret.add(resolved);
304                                        }
305                                }
306                        }
307                        
308                        return ret.stream().distinct().collect(Collectors.toList());
309                }
310                
311                private static URI resolve(URI uri, URI base) {         
312                        if (uri.isRelative() && base.isHierarchical()) {
313                                if (!base.isRelative()) { 
314                                        return uri.resolve(base);
315                                }
316                                // Resolving containment path URI against container URI by combining all segments and treating the first first segment as scheme, second as authority and the rest as segments.                 
317                                List<String> allParts = new ArrayList<>();
318                                if (base.scheme() != null) {
319                                        allParts.add(base.scheme());
320                                }
321                                if (base.authority() != null) {
322                                        allParts.add(base.authority());
323                                }
324                                allParts.addAll(base.segmentsList());
325                                
326                                if (uri.scheme() != null) {
327                                        allParts.add(uri.scheme());
328                                }
329                                if (uri.authority() != null) {
330                                        allParts.add(uri.authority());
331                                }
332                                allParts.addAll(uri.segmentsList());
333                                
334                                if (allParts.size() == 0) {
335                                        return uri;
336                                }
337                                
338                                if (allParts.size() == 1) {
339                                        return URI.createURI(allParts.get(0));
340                                }
341
342                                if (allParts.size() == 2 && allParts.get(1).length() == 0) {
343                                        return URI.createURI(String.join("/", allParts) + (uri == null ? "" : uri));                            
344                                }
345                                
346                                URI allPartsURI = URI.createHierarchicalURI(allParts.get(0), allParts.get(1), null, allParts.subList(2, allParts.size()).toArray(new String[allParts.size() - 2]), null, null);
347                                return uri == null ? allPartsURI : uri.resolve(allPartsURI);
348                        }
349
350                        return null;
351                }
352
353        /**
354         * @param eObj
355         * @return true if the argument is an entry for EMap
356         */
357        public static boolean isEMapEntry(EObject eObj) {
358                if (eObj instanceof Map.Entry) {
359                        EReference cf = eObj.eContainmentFeature();
360                        return cf != null && cf.isMany() && cf.getEType().getInstanceClass() == Map.Entry.class;
361                }
362                return false;
363        }
364                
365        public static EObject commonAncestor(EObject a, EObject b) {
366                if (a == null || b == null) {
367                        return null;
368                }
369                if (EcoreUtil.isAncestor(a, b)) {
370                        return a.eContainer();
371                }
372                if (EcoreUtil.isAncestor(b, a)) {
373                        b.eContainer();
374                }
375                for (EObject ancestor = a.eContainer(); ancestor != null; ancestor = ancestor.eContainer()) {
376                        if (EcoreUtil.isAncestor(ancestor, b)) {
377                                return ancestor;
378                        }
379                }
380                return null;
381        }

405        /**
406         * Feature key is used for feature loading from YAML and other key-value sources and also in construction of containment path by containmentPath() method and, as such, EObject {@link URI} by getUri() method.
407         * This method traverses the class inheritance hierarchy and uses feature-keys class-level annotations to retrieve feature key. If such an annotation is not found then feature-level feature-key annotation is used.
408         * If none is found in the entire hierarchy then feature name is converted to kebab case is returned. 
409         * @param eClass Context class for which feature key is retrieved.
410         * @param feature Feature
411         * @return
412         */
413        public static String getFeatureKey(EClass eClass, EStructuralFeature feature) {
414                String featureKey = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(feature, FEATURE_KEY);
415                if (!Util.isBlank(featureKey)) {
416                        return featureKey;
417                }
418                
419                for (EClass ec: NcoreUtil.lineage(eClass)) {
420                        String featureKeys = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ec, FEATURE_KEYS);
421                        if (!Util.isBlank(featureKeys)) {
422                                Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
423                                Map<String,Object> featureKeyMap = yaml.load(featureKeys);
424                                Object fKey = featureKeyMap.get(feature.getName());
425                                if (fKey instanceof String) {
426                                        return (String) fKey;
427                                }
428                        }
429                }
430                return Util.camelToKebab(feature.getName());
431        }
432
433        /**
434         * 
435         * @param eReference
436         * @return "Logical" opposite - either the "physical" opposite returned by {@link EReference}.getEOpposite() or a reference with a name specified in "opposite" Nasdanika annotation
437         * or a reference which specifies this reference in its "opposite" Nasdanika annotation.
438         */
439        public static EReference getOpposite(EReference eReference) {
440                EReference opposite = eReference.getEOpposite();
441                if (opposite != null) {
442                        return opposite;
443                }
444                String oName = getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, "opposite");
445                EClass refType = eReference.getEReferenceType();
446                for (EReference ref: refType.getEAllReferences()) {
447                        if (ref.getName().equals(oName)) {
448                                return ref;
449                        }
450                        if (ref.getEReferenceType() == eReference.getEContainingClass() && eReference.getName().equals(getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ref, "opposite"))) {
451                                return ref;
452                        }
453                }
454                return null;
455        }
456
457        /**
458         * Computes end and duration from start and previously loaded things.
459         * @param period
460         * @param newStart
461         */
462        public static void onStart(Period period, Temporal newStart) {
463                if (newStart != null) {
464                        LoadTracker loadTracker = (LoadTracker) EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter(period, LoadTracker.class);
465                        if (loadTracker != null && loadTracker.isLoading(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__START)) {
466                                if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__END)) {
467                                        if (!loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__DURATION)) {
468                                                period.setDuration(period.getEnd().minus(newStart));
469                                        }
470                                } else if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__DURATION)) {
471                                        period.setEnd(newStart.plus(period.getDuration()));
472                                }
473                        }
474                }
475        }
476
477        public static void onEnd(Period period, Temporal newEnd) {
478                if (newEnd != null) {
479                        LoadTracker loadTracker = (LoadTracker) EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter(period, LoadTracker.class);
480                        if (loadTracker != null && loadTracker.isLoading(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__END)) {
481                                if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__START)) {
482                                        if (!loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__DURATION)) {
483                                                period.setDuration(newEnd.minus(period.getStart()));
484                                        }
485                                } else if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__DURATION)) {
486                                        period.setStart(newEnd.minus(period.getDuration()));
487                                }
488                        }
489                }
490        }
491
492        public static void onDuration(Period period, Duration newDuration) {
493                if (newDuration != null) {
494                        LoadTracker loadTracker = (LoadTracker) EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter(period, LoadTracker.class);
495                        if (loadTracker != null && loadTracker.isLoading(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__DURATION)) {
496                                if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__START)) {
497                                        if (!loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__END)) {
498                                                period.setEnd(period.getStart().plus(newDuration));
499                                        }
500                                } else if (loadTracker.isLoaded(NcorePackage.Literals.PERIOD__END)) {
501                                        period.setStart(period.getEnd().minus(newDuration));
502                                }
503                        }
504                }
505        }
506        
507        /**
508         * @param eReference
509         * @return Target EClass of association class reference.
510         */
511        public static EClass getAssociationTarget(EReference eReference) {
512                String association = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, "association");
513                if (Util.isBlank(association)) {
514                        return null;
515                }
516                EClass refType = eReference.getEReferenceType();
517                EStructuralFeature associationFeature = refType.getEStructuralFeature(association);
518                if (associationFeature instanceof EReference) {
519                        return ((EReference) associationFeature).getEReferenceType();
520                }
521                return null;            
522        }       
523        
524        public static org.nasdanika.ncore.String wrapString(String str) {
525                org.nasdanika.ncore.String strObj = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createString();
526                strObj.setValue(str);           
527                return strObj;
528        }
